org.middleheaven.util.validation
Interface Validator<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of object this validator can validate.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AllwaysValidValidator, AnnotatedBeanValidator, BeanValidator, CompositeValidator, IntervalValidator, LengthValidator, LogicValidator, NotDuplicatedValidator, NotEmptyValidator, NotExistsValidator, NotNullValidator, SimpleEmailAddressValidator
public interface Validator<T>

Encapsulates the logic to validate an object

Method Summary

          Validates the given object.
